description: Ralph Lauren is proud to partner with Morehouse, a prestigious historically Black college, to introduce a first-of-its-kind collection. Inspired by the rich heritage and esteemed traditions of Morehouse College, this polo coat is tailored in Italy from an exclusive parquet tweed that is sourced from a renowned British mill.
fitting_details: Size 40R has a 46" front body length, a 45.75" back body length, an 18.75" shoulder, and a 19.5" sleeve inseam.
Peak lapels. Buttonholes at each lapel. Double-breasted silhouette. Genuine horn buttons.
Left chest welt pocket. Two front waist flapped pockets. Two interior chest pockets.
Shell: 100% wool. Body lining: 51% cotton, 49% viscose. Sleeve lining: 100% viscose. Dry clean. Made in Italy.
Model is 6'1" (185 cm) and wears a size 40R.
Please note that due to high demand, each Morehouse Collection style is limited to two per person.
